member.remarks: Implemented as per the protocol described at https://docs.aws.amazon.com/appsync/latest/devguide/real-time-websocket-client.html.

member.name: T:AllOverIt.Aws.AppSync.Client.Configuration.GraphqlClientConfiguration
member.summary: Contains configuration details for AppSync Graphql query and mutation operations.

member.summary: Represents configuration details for AppSync Graphql query and mutation operations.

member.name: P:AllOverIt.Aws.AppSync.Client.Configuration.IGraphqlClientConfiguration.EndPoint
member.summary: The fully-qualified AppSync Graphql endpoint to perform query and mutation operations.

member.name: P:AllOverIt.Aws.AppSync.Client.Configuration.IGraphqlClientConfiguration.Serializer
member.summary: The serializer to be used for message processing.

member.name: P:AllOverIt.Aws.AppSync.Client.Configuration.IGraphqlClientConfiguration.DefaultAuthorization
member.summary: Provides the default authorization mode to use for all requests.

member.name: T:AllOverIt.Aws.AppSync.Client.Configuration.ISubscriptionClientConfiguration
member.summary: Represents configuration details for the AppSync Graphql subscription client.

member.name: P:AllOverIt.Aws.AppSync.Client.Configuration.ISubscriptionClientConfiguration.Host
member.summary: AppSync's graphql host Url without the https:// prefix or /graphql suffix.

member.name: P:AllOverIt.Aws.AppSync.Client.Configuration.ISubscriptionClientConfiguration.RealTimeUrl
member.summary: The realtime url used for subscriptions without the https:// prefix.
member.remarks: If not set, this Url is derived from the Host by replacing 'appsync-api' with 'appsync-realtime-api' and appending '/graphql'. If a value is provided then it must be the full custom domain realtime Url without the https:// prefix.

member.name: P:AllOverIt.Aws.AppSync.Client.Configuration.ISubscriptionClientConfiguration.Serializer
member.summary: The serializer to be used for message processing.

member.name: P:AllOverIt.Aws.AppSync.Client.Configuration.ISubscriptionClientConfiguration.DefaultAuthorization
member.summary: Provides the default authorization mode to use for all requests.

member.name: P:AllOverIt.Aws.AppSync.Client.Configuration.ISubscriptionClientConfiguration.ConnectionOptions
member.summary: Provides subscription connection options.

member.name: T:AllOverIt.Aws.AppSync.Client.Configuration.SubscriptionClientConfiguration
member.summary: Contains configuration details for the AppSync Graphql subscription client.

member.name: T:AllOverIt.Aws.AppSync.Client.Configuration.SubscriptionClientConnectionOptions
member.summary: Provides subscription client connection options.

member.name: P:AllOverIt.Aws.AppSync.Client.Configuration.SubscriptionClientConnectionOptions.ConnectionTimeout
member.summary: The initial connection-handshake timeout period.

member.name: P:AllOverIt.Aws.AppSync.Client.Configuration.SubscriptionClientConnectionOptions.SubscriptionTimeout
member.summary: The initial subscribe-handshake and unsubscribe-handshake timeout period. If a subscribe fails then the subscription is returned in an error state. If an unsubscribe fails, the subscription is dropped on the assumption there is something wrong with the connection.

member.name: T:AllOverIt.Aws.AppSync.Client.Exceptions.GraphqlHttpRequestException
member.summary: This exception is raised when a non-successful graphql query or mutation occurs.

member.summary: The HTTP status code.

member.summary: When not null, this provides all graphql errors associated with the query or mutation request.

member.name: T:AllOverIt.Aws.AppSync.Client.Exceptions.WebSocketConnectionLostException
member.summary: This exception is raised when there was an expectation that a WebSocket is available but found to be unavailable (due to an error that caused the connection to be shutdown).

member.summary: Determines if the exception contains any errors with an error type of 'ExecutionTimeout", as reported by AppSync.
member.param: The exception containing errors.
member.returns: True if the exception contains any errors with an error type of 'ExecutionTimeout", otherwise false.

member.name: T:AllOverIt.Aws.AppSync.Client.IAppSyncSubscriptionClient
member.summary: Represents an AppSync subscription client that supports API KEY and Cognito based authorization.

member.name: P:AllOverIt.Aws.AppSync.Client.IAppSyncSubscriptionClient.ConnectionState
member.summary: An observable providing the current connection status.

member.name: P:AllOverIt.Aws.AppSync.Client.IAppSyncSubscriptionClient.Exceptions
member.summary: An observable reporting connection and subscription related exceptions.

member.name: P:AllOverIt.Aws.AppSync.Client.IAppSyncSubscriptionClient.GraphqlErrors
member.summary: An observable reporting subscription related graphql errors.

member.name: P:AllOverIt.Aws.AppSync.Client.IAppSyncSubscriptionClient.IsAlive
member.summary: Indicates if the client is currently connected to AppSync.

member.name: M:AllOverIt.Aws.AppSync.Client.IAppSyncSubscriptionClient.ConnectAsync
member.summary: Opens a WebSocket connection and registers the client with AppSync. Any existing subscriptions from a previous connection will be re-subscribed.
member.returns: True if the connection was established, otherwise false.
member.remarks: Refer to for more information on how existing subscriptions are retained if the client is disconnected while there are active subscriptions.

member.name: M:AllOverIt.Aws.AppSync.Client.IAppSyncSubscriptionClient.DisconnectAsync
member.summary: Unsubscribes any existing subscriptions and then disconnects the client from AppSync. The subscription registrations are maintained (not disposed of). If a new connection is later established by calling or making a new subscription then all previous subscriptions will be re-subscribed.

member.name: M:AllOverIt.Aws.AppSync.Client.IAppSyncSubscriptionClient.SubscribeAsync``1(AllOverIt.Aws.AppSync.Client.Request.SubscriptionQuery,System.Action{AllOverIt.Aws.AppSync.Client.Response.GraphqlSubscriptionResponse{``0}},AllOverIt.Aws.AppSync.Client.Authorization.IAppSyncAuthorization)
member.summary: Registers a new subscription with AppSync. If there is no active connection then that will be established first.
member.typeparam: The response type to be populated when the subscription receives a message.
member.param: The subscription query.
The action to invoke when a response is received.
The authorization to use for the request. If null is provided then the default authorization provided on the client configuration during construction will be used.
member.returns: A subscription registration. The subscription will be closed when this registration is disposed of.

member.name: T:AllOverIt.Aws.AppSync.Client.Subscription.AppSyncSubscriptionRegistration
member.summary: Decorates the async disposable created by SubscribeAsync() so the caller can obtain the generated subscription Id and any errors that occurred during connection / registration.

member.name: P:AllOverIt.Aws.AppSync.Client.Subscription.AppSyncSubscriptionRegistration.Id
member.summary: The subscription Id.

member.name: P:AllOverIt.Aws.AppSync.Client.Subscription.AppSyncSubscriptionRegistration.Exceptions
member.summary: When not null, contains exceptions raised during registration, such as connection issues.

member.name: P:AllOverIt.Aws.AppSync.Client.Subscription.AppSyncSubscriptionRegistration.GraphqlErrors
member.summary: When not null, contains graphql errors raised during registration, such as request/response mapping errors.

member.name: P:AllOverIt.Aws.AppSync.Client.Subscription.AppSyncSubscriptionRegistration.Success
member.summary: Returns true if the registration was completed successfully (no graphql errors or exceptions).

member.name: M:AllOverIt.Aws.AppSync.Client.Subscription.AppSyncSubscriptionRegistration.#ctor(System.String,System.IAsyncDisposable)
member.summary: Constructor. Used when a successful subscription is registered with AppSync.
member.param: The subscription identifier.
The subscription that will unregister from AppSync when disposed.

member.name: M:AllOverIt.Aws.AppSync.Client.Subscription.AppSyncSubscriptionRegistration.#ctor(System.String,System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{System.Exception})
member.summary: Constructor.
member.param: The subscription identifier.
One or more exceptions raised during the registration process. These exceptions are typically associated with connectivity issues.

member.summary: Constructor.
member.param: The subscription identifier.
One or more graphql errors raised during the registration process. These errors are typically associated with invalid queries or request/response mappings.

member.summary: Disposes of the subscription including unsubscribing from AppSync.

member.name: P:AllOverIt.Aws.AppSync.Client.Subscription.IAppSyncSubscriptionRegistration.Id
member.summary: The unique subscription identifier.

member.name: P:AllOverIt.Aws.AppSync.Client.Subscription.IAppSyncSubscriptionRegistration.Exceptions
member.summary: When not null, contains one or more exceptions raised during the request to register the subscription.

member.name: P:AllOverIt.Aws.AppSync.Client.Subscription.IAppSyncSubscriptionRegistration.GraphqlErrors

member.name: P:AllOverIt.Aws.AppSync.Client.Subscription.IAppSyncSubscriptionRegistration.Success

member.name: T:AllOverIt.Aws.AppSync.Client.Subscription.SubscriptionConnectionState
member.summary: Contains all connection states applicable to a subscription registration.

member.name: F:AllOverIt.Aws.AppSync.Client.Subscription.SubscriptionConnectionState.Connecting
member.summary: A new connection to AppSync has begun.

member.name: F:AllOverIt.Aws.AppSync.Client.Subscription.SubscriptionConnectionState.Connected
member.summary: A connection has been established with AppSync and is now ready for subscription registrations.

member.name: F:AllOverIt.Aws.AppSync.Client.Subscription.SubscriptionConnectionState.KeepAlive
member.summary: Indicates the subscription registration is still healthy.

member.name: F:AllOverIt.Aws.AppSync.Client.Subscription.SubscriptionConnectionState.Disconnecting
member.summary: The websocket connection is disconnecting either explicitly or due to an error.

member.name: F:AllOverIt.Aws.AppSync.Client.Subscription.SubscriptionConnectionState.Disconnected
member.summary: The websocket connection has disconnected from AppSync.

member.name: F:AllOverIt.Aws.AppSync.Client.Subscription.SubscriptionConnectionState.ConnectionReset
member.summary: A message has not been received so the connection is being re-established.

member.name: M:AllOverIt.Aws.AppSync.Client.Subscription.SubscriptionRegistrationRequest.NotifyResponse(System.String)
